summary: Frontend changes add explicit delete-confirm state and handlers in FoldersFullScreenView and MissionsFullScreenView that call the existing delete mutations and show success/error toasts. The diff does not provide evidence that React Query caches are invalidated/updated after deletion, nor does it show any backend deletion logic changes (backend file even states no changes needed).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure backend deletion methods invoked by the swipe-to-delete flows correctly remove the target entities for the authenticated caller (folder deletion removes the folder record; mission deletion removes the mission record), and that frontend React Query caches are invalidated/updated so the UI state stays consistent with backend state.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff only shows the UI calling delete mutations and toasts; it does not show any React Query invalidation/update logic in hooks or cache updates tied to these deletions. Backend file snippet explicitly indicates no changes and does not show deletion methods or fixes.
